Key: All right! Time to get studying today!

Well, it's probably nothing compared to
Origami, but maybe if I study, some of her
good luck will rub off on me...
Heighten oneself, huh...? Yeah! Let's do it!

(Once I opened the notebook, I saw a neatly
handwritten note...)
Good work with your studies. I enjoyed myself\nstudying with you, Shido. Usually I stare at you,\nbut today you stared at me. I enjoyed that, too.
Next time you come over, we should try\nactivities other than studying.
